item.title: Soooo what can i get out of this
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

playerSE = standard emote (for when standing still)
playerSEA = standard attack emote (self explanitory)
playerSEW = standard walking emote
playerSER = running emote

Read full topic
item.source: Soooo what can i get out of this

item.title: Soooo what can i get out of this
item.dc:creator: @tuppatsch tuppatsch
item.description:
@tuppatsch wrote:

well i was snooping through p16 4.5

its a realy good server if u know what ur doing. very organized

i found this and i know it has efects on the attacking animations

if (wearID == 4734) { // Karils x-bow
playerSE = 2074;
playerSEA = 2075;
playerSEW = 2076;
playerSER = 2077;

problem is i dont know what the differences are between playerSE playerSEA exc are.

also i found some items that only had this

if (wearID == 4747) { // Torag Hammers
playerSEA = 0x814;

this one only has playerSEA

and i know if u delete this alltogether the wepon will do the animation of the wepon u used before it

so say i deted

if (wearID == 4747) { // Torag Hammers
playerSEA = 0x814;

loged on used throwing knives then switched to hammer i would still do the throwing knife animation.

i hope the helps someone else in some way and someone can help me.

Read full topic
item.source: Soooo what can i get out of this
